DOC.brief_summary: Specific Aims Hypotheses Aims To investigate incremental benefit cervicothoracic spinal manipulation addition shoulder mobilization exercise improve range motion , pain , physical function fear avoidance belief patient subacromial shoulder impingement . Hypotheses It hypothesized subject receive spinal manipulation addition shoulder mobilization exercise achieve great improvement range motion , pain , function fear avoidance beliefs two week follow treatment conclusion , 4 week follow treatment conclusion , discharge compare subject receive spinal manipulation .
DOC.brief_title: Subacute Effects Spinal Mobilization Treat Subacromial Impingement
DOC.criteria: To eligible , participant must meet clinical prediction rule unilateral subacromial shoulder impingement include : ) positive HawkinsKennedy impingement sign , b ) positive painful arc sign , c ) weakness external rotation arm side Individuals contraindication treatment mobilization manipulation ( Appendix A ) exclude
